text: The Reporter or The Ethiopian Reporter is an Ethiopian newspaper. It began on July 8, 1991. Media Communication Center makes it. == History == The Reporter was created by Media Communication Center. Amare Aregawi owns the Media Communication Center. In 2010, Amare Aregawi became the Editor-in-chief of the Reporter. The Reporter is one of the most popular Ethiopian newspapers. ==References== Category:1991 establishments in Africa Category:Newspapers in Africa
title: The Reporter (Ethiopia)
